name: LiveWellRERCNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Follow the LiveWell Rehabilitation Engineering Research Center's (RERC) Flash Briefing Alexa skill to get updates on current digital health trends and topics. This skill also gives updates on the RERC's current initiatives and news. 

Get Tech Watch & LiveWell News first by moving LiveWell RERC News to the top of your news brief in the Alexa App under "Settings" -> "Flash Briefing".

After enabling the LiveWell RERC News skill say "Alexa, what's the news?" or "Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing" to hear the most up to date information.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
